name: In the depth of the war
name_original: In the depth of the war
description:
With the powerful weapons, reduce the enemy's enemy's speed and bring the enemy to your knees with heavy assault and rocket attacks.

Increase the power of defense, support, and attack, and do not hesitate to win anything.

You can increase your military strength so that you can reach the heaviest weapon and use the heavy weapon at the right time to get the least damage. Destructive bombs like the atom bomb destroy everything, they should be used in the best of conditions.

If you do not go to war, avoid the slightest neglect
